${index+1}`,style:imageStyle},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:detailsStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:sectionStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{style:{color:"#2c3e50"},children:["Price: ",product.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:sectionStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:"#8e44ad"},children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:sectionStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:"#8e44ad"},children:"Features:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:product.features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:feature},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:sectionStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:"#8e44ad"},children:"Terms & Conditions:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:product.terms.map((term,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:term},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/order",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{...buttonStyle,...handleButtonHover},children:"Buy Now"})," "]})]})]})]});};export default ProductDetail;
